The_Problem

MISSED CALLS
KILL GROWTH.

If you miss the first 30 seconds, you usually lose the job. Agent Broski answers instantly, qualifies intent, and routes the lead into a booked outcome.

No voicemail leak. No ring-and-bail.
Texts instantly

Qualifies intent

The_Outcome

YOUR FRONT DESK,
ON AUTOPILOT.

Broski doesn’t “chat”. It converts. You get cleaner pipelines, higher booking rates, and fewer dropped leads — without hiring.

Captures name, service need, timeframe, and location
Handles basic objections and pricing guardrails
Updates CRM notes + tags automatically
Transfers to a human when needed
Records + transcripts every conversation for QA
